@dyancflores @VinayPatel @NaomiSheldon1 @northernluke @bushtheatre @youngvictheatre @TrafStudios @UnicornTheatre @royalcourt @timcrouch1964 @kaylalalalaaa @AmaliaVitale @VAULTFestival @VespertilioPlay @mapperry @mauddromgoole @lucky_wood @_sashawilson You are so welcome. You’re in for a treat.

@dyancflores @VinayPatel @NaomiSheldon1 @northernluke @bushtheatre @youngvictheatre @TrafStudios @UnicornTheatre @royalcourt @timcrouch1964 @kaylalalalaaa @AmaliaVitale Come to @VAULTFestival and watch everything! (But especially @VespertilioPlay which I am working on and which is going to be beautiful)

@STEPHENLAUGHT0N So true. And I wish I could come see your show, but I’m in the states until the end of the year. I’ll catch it at the inevitable west end transfer. Sorry lovely, and congratulations on all the amazing responses to the play.

Basically @VinayPatel, @NaomiSheldon1, @northernluke, @bushtheatre, @youngvictheatre, @TrafStudios, @UnicornTheatre, @royalcourt, @timcrouch1964 @kaylalalalaaa @AmaliaVitale are all crushing it. Go see new plays!

Oh fuck, I forgot It’s True, It’s True, It’s True!
I feel so incredibly lucky to know so many amazing theatre makers, who write, direct, and perform work that speaks to me on a deep soul level.
